howItWorks.sectionDescription: In just three simple steps, you'll be ready to impress recruiters and discover new opportunities.

step1.title: 1. Your CV, the Foundation
step1.description: Provide your CV, and our AI will extract key information to build your unique profile.

step2.title: 2. Automatic Magic
step2.description: Our AI transforms your information into an elegant and optimized public professional profile.

step3.title: 3. Connect and Grow
step3.description: Your new site will open doors to job opportunities tailored to you.

benefit1.title: Instant Professional Website
benefit1.description: Turn your CV into an attractive, modern microsite in minutes.

benefit2.title: Increase Your Visibility
benefit2.description: Stand out from the crowd and reach recruiters looking for your unique profile.

benefit3.title: New Opportunities
benefit3.description: Connect with relevant job offers effortlessly.

benefit4.title: Easy to Use
benefit4.description: An intuitive interface designed so you can focus on what's important: your career.
